title: INote.SetBalloon
description: Sets the balloon style, size, and fit for this note.
signature:
System.Boolean SetBalloon( 
   System.Int32
Style
,
   System.Int32
Size
)

parameters.name: Style
parameters.description: Balloon style as defined in swBalloonStyle_e

parameters.name: Size
parameters.description: Balloon size or fit as defined in swBalloonFit_e

returns: True if the style and size are successfully set, false if not
remarks:
If the style is specified as swBS_None, the size value is ignored.
The swBS_SplitCirc style is not valid for use with this method. If it is used, then the style is set to swBS_None instead.
If an invalid style or size is specified (one that is not in the enumeration), this method returns false and no action is taken.
